mapper.select: SELECT p.*, ( SELECT MIN(sku.reserve) FROM app_product_sku sku WHERE sku.product_id = p.id and sku.deleted=0 and sku.locked=0 ) as productPrice FROM app_product p WHERE p.`status` = #{status} AND p.`name` like CONCAT(#{keyWord},'%')

SELECT p.*, ( SELECT MIN(sku.reserve) FROM app_product_sku sku WHERE sku.product_id = p.id and sku.deleted=0 and sku.locked=0 ) as productPrice FROM app_product p WHERE #{reserve} > ( SELECT MIN(sku.reserve) FROM app_product_sku sku WHERE sku.product_id = p.id and sku.deleted=0 and sku.locked=0 )
select count(1) FROM app_product_sku sku where sku.reserve<#{reserve} GROUP BY sku.product_id
mapper.update: update app_product p set p.`status`=#{status} where p.id=#{productId}
